question: Write a letter to your boss apologizing for the recent meeting you missed at work.Apologize for missing the meetingExplain what happened Say what you will do to compensate
text: I am writing this letter to express my apology that I was unable to attend  our meeting related to the implementation of our internal policy yesterday. I know the importance of that meeting in our internal department.

Please be informed that I am ready for my presentation for the said discussion, however, there is an emergency happening on that day, and I need to travel going back to my home town. This is a family issue, and very personal that I need to settle right away.

I will be back on Monday morning. Please do let me know if you are available that day for the meeting. Once again, I would like to ask for your kind understanding in this matter, and I will take the necessary steps to avoid such a situation in the future.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
